text:
In January 2024, I happened to do detox (no meat and gluten) and intermittent fasting. I decided to try out Ru Yi Vegetarian. It serves a variety of vegetable and brown rice. I lost a whopping 9 kg in 23 days and there after another 3.2kg in July.

Doing another detox in November with Farmz Asia.

Generous serving of carbs, though I did see others receiving more vegetables for their dishes.

ðŸ’° At $3.70, it was okay for the portion received.

Taste wise was alright as well, nothing to complain about and to shout about too.
Reasonable price, generous portion, variety of choices
Relatively healthy vegetarian food, wide variety of fresh vege
